item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the summary for my first blog post. It will show up on the ‘All’ page. The full content is inside this file.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I am a creative technologist with a passion for building beautiful and functional user experiences. My journey into the world of design and development started with a curiosity for how things work, which quickly evolved into a career dedicated to crafting elegant solutions to complex problems.

Motion Designer and Video Editor with 4+ years of experience and strong leadership skills in advertising, marketing, and education.

I believe that the best products are born from a deep understanding of user needs, combined with a relentless pursuit of quality and innovation.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description:
I’m always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of an ambitious vision. If you have a project in mind or just want to say hi, please get in touch.

You can reach me via email at prabhat.pushpak@gmail.com.

Alternatively, you can connect with me on my social profiles. I look forward to hearing from you!
